scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start -w we"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/we.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a we network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w we && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/we/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/lobby/workdir
